string.value: Is the #t4032332# ready? You should talk to #b#p2060000##k of #b#m230010201##k.

You receive the completed #t4032332# from #p2060000#. This should be enough to raise the Wolf Pup for a bit. You should head to #b#m140000000##k right away and give #b#p1202007##k the formula. Pucci is probably waiting somewhere around the #bSnowy Field 2#k.
Having finished the formula, the Wolf Pup seemed to have taken a liking toward you. #p1202007# ended up giving you the wolf pup, which he named #t1902015#, to raise. You vow to take good care of him.
Alright, here's the #t4032332#! This should really do the trick for your growing wolf pup! Would you like to put the formula in your inventory right now?
Alright, make sure to give your pup the formula before it gets too cold. If you have any other questions about raising wolves, feel free to ask me, okay? Have fun!
#b(You get the formula for the wolf pup. Time to return to Pucci. He should be somewhere around Snowy Field 2.)#k
Please think again. The formula won't taste as good if it's cold.
Oh! You're back! Did you meet #p2060000#? Wait…is that #t4032332#? Did you get that for the wolf pup? Oh my goodness, thank you so much! I'm going to feed the pup right now!
Oh my goodness, the pup just opened its eyes! The formula must be really doing the trick. Wait a minute, the pup…looks like it wants to follow you around, dear hero…

I guess even the wolf pups recognizes someone that's saved their lives. Seriously, it's really following you! *Sigh* If that is the case, I give up. There's no other choice but for you to raise this adorable wolf pup.
I named it #t1902015#. Isn't that an awesome name? You'll be taking care of this wolf pup from here on out, okay?
Did you not deliver the #t4032332# yet? It's a pup, so it needs to be fed constantly or it'll be weakened beyond help. Please go see #bthe wolf pup's guardian#k. Hurry.
Haven't you gone to see #b#p2060000##k yet? I'm sure #p2060000# knows what you have to do to take care of wolf pups…
Oh no…did you lose the #t4032332#? Good thing there's enough for another batch. I'll give you the rest, so please don't lose it this time!
